metadata.title: CVE-2012-3521 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Multiple directory traversal vulnerabilities in the cssgen contrib modulein GeSHi before 1.0.8.11 allow remote attackers to read arbitrary files viaa .. (dot dot) in the (1) geshi-path or (2) geshi-lang-path parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3521` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-geshi - 1.0.8.11-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: geshi package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.8.11-2').
